### Task 1 - Tidy the data

#### Write up

<!-- Include write up here -->

#### Code

```{r task1}
f1_tidy = f1 %>%
  tibble::tibble(f1 = .) %>%
  hoist(
    f1, 
    MRData = c("MRData")
  )%>%
  hoist(
    MRData,
    table = c("RaceTable")
  )%>%
  select(-MRData)%>%
  hoist(
    table,
    round_1 = list("Races", 1, "round"),
    round_2 = list("Races", 2, "round"),
    race_name_1 = list("Races", 1, "raceName"),
    date_1 = list("Races", 1, "date"),
    Results_1 = list("Races", 1, "Results")
  )%>%
  select(-table)%>%
  unnest(Results_1)%>%
  unnest(Results_1)
  

f1_tidy
```
```{r attempt2}
f1_tidy2 = f1 %>%
  tibble::tibble(f1 = .) %>%
  hoist(
    f1, 
    MRData = c("MRData")
  )%>%
  hoist(
    MRData,
    table = c("RaceTable")
  )%>%
  select(-MRData)%>%
  hoist(
    table,
    races = c("Races")
  )%>%
  select(-table)%>%
  unnest_longer(races)%>%
  hoist(
    races,
    race_name = c("raceName"),
    round = c("round"),
    date = c("date"),
    results = c("Results")
  )%>%
  select(-races)%>%
  unnest_longer(results)%>%
  hoist(
    results,
    
  )

f1_tidy2
```
